name: schematic-class
description: Integrated JSON schema for JavaScript classes

scripts.build: node src/jsonclass.js ESM >esm/jsonclass.js && node src/jsonclass.js CJS >jsonclass.js
scripts.test:instrument:cjs: nyc instrument jsonclass.js test/coverage-instrumented && cd test/coverage-instrumented && mv jsonclass.js tmp && cat ../coverage-copyright tmp >jsonclass.js && rm tmp
scripts.test:instrument:esm: nyc instrument esm/jsonclass.js test/coverage-instrumented && cat test/coverage-copyright test/coverage-instrumented/esm/jsonclass.js >test/coverage-instrumented/esm/jsonclass.mjs && rm test/coverage-instrumented/esm/jsonclass.js
scripts.test:instrument: npm run test:extract-copyright && npm run test:instrument:cjs && npm run test:instrument:esm
scripts.test: npm run test:instrument && npm run test:run
